item.title: E-Waste Management Software
item.description:
Introduction

.NET framework based project for predictive analysis of best route to take in order to recycle E-waste given a set of initial parameters to consider

Duration: August 2017 to November 2017

Mentor: Prof. Indranil Saha, CSE Dept. IIT Kanpur

Details

  • Uses GUI based forms for taking user surveys and performs DataBase Management using MS Excel
  • Converts electronic gadgets input by the users into precise amounts of substances in E-waste
  • Implements self-designed algorithms to display best solutions for given set of data in a survey
  • Accounts for economic factors, environmental factors and performs relative analysis
